content: If you recognize that feminism is about destroying the family structure as we know it, then the reasons feminists hate women become clear. On the feminist hit list are: Married women with or without children Married women not employed outside the home …and as you mentioned, any woman who disagrees with or questions their ideology. Never mind most of it makes no sense at all. The problem is that feminists were hardly ever questioned for decades, and they got used to having the final say in everything. ;>)
